title: I need some help because my client is not starting an endless loop or restarting client!
body:
When I open the client of LOL I get this message. "We have restored this installation to an older version of League of Legends. Now we'll try to patch it up to the latest version." Then I click the "Okay" button and I get this. "There was a problem patching League of Legends. We'll restore a backup version and try updating again after you restart the patcher." And there is a restart button under it. After i click on it it does the same thing again. I need help with this problem!

Please help me I want to play!
Thank you.

replies.body:
I can definitely tell this has been a stressful situation for you, so take a breath and let's work on this together.  I've seen quite a few of your other posts, but let's focus on this one for now on to prevent any confusion or potential spamming.

Up to this point, have you since gone through every single step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide?  Based on the issue described, it seems like your settings or anti-virus is preventing your game files from being accessed.  Go over that and let me know!
I have LOL in full permissions and it runs as admin and still, I can't play. Please fix this problem!
I am also having the same problem, the issue is the new client is not compatible with the latest windows update ( found this out with the compatibility tool ).
But you have any type of solution? Because I have tried to message Riot a lot of times and no respond!
How about uninstall the latest update Windows Update installed?
That is not gonna work and prob gonna break something
